title: The Flynn effect is best illustrated by which o...

content.question: The Flynn effect is best illustrated by which of the following statements?

choices.label: A child must clean his room before his parents allow him to watch television.
Intelligence scores increase from generation to generation.
An individual agrees to a small request and complies later with a larger request.

content.answer: Intelligence scores increase from generation to generation.

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
